item.title: EXT4 Patches Enable Block Size Greater Than Page Size Support

item.title: Your Crypto Isn’t Safe Outside the Blockchain, Vitalik Buterin Warns
item.description:
Vitalik Buterin emphasized that blockchain's cryptographic safeguards protect on-chain funds from validator collusion but offer no protection for off-chain activities like oracles or restaking that depend on validator honesty rather than protocol enforcement.

The post Your Crypto Isn’t Safe Outside the Blockchain, Vitalik Buterin Warns appeared first on Cryptonews.
